name: tweetnacl
description: Port of TweetNaCl cryptographic library to JavaScript

0.9.1.name: tweetnacl
0.9.1.description: Port of TweetNaCl cryptographic library to JavaScript

scripts.build: uglifyjs nacl.js -c -m -o nacl.min.js && uglifyjs nacl-fast.js -c -m -o nacl-fast.min.js
scripts.testall: make -C test/c && tape test/*.js test/c/*.js | faucet
scripts.firefox: browserify test/browser/testling_init.js test/*.js | testling -x firefox | faucet
scripts.chrome: browserify test/browser/testling_init.js test/*.js | testling -x google-chrome | faucet

0.13.3.name: tweetnacl

scripts.build: uglifyjs nacl.js -c -m -o nacl.min.js && uglifyjs nacl-fast.js -c -m -o nacl-fast.min.js
scripts.testall: make -C test/c && tape test/*.js test/c/*.js | faucet
scripts.firefox: browserify test/browser/testling_init.js test/*.js | testling -x firefox | faucet
scripts.chrome: browserify test/browser/testling_init.js test/*.js | testling -x google-chrome | faucet

0.14.0.name: tweetnacl
0.14.0.description: Port of TweetNaCl cryptographic library to JavaScript

scripts.build: uglifyjs nacl.js -c -m -o nacl.min.js && uglifyjs nacl-fast.js -c -m -o nacl-fast.min.js
scripts.test-node-all: make -C test/c && tape test/*.js test/c/*.js | faucet
scripts.test-browser: NACL_SRC=${NACL_SRC:='nacl.min.js'} && npm run build-test-browser && cat $NACL_SRC test/browser/_bundle.js | tape-run | faucet
scripts.build-test-browser: browserify test/browser/init.js test/*.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o test/browser/_bundle.js 2>/dev/null && browserify test/browser/init.js test/*.quick.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o test/browser/_bundle-quick.js 2>/dev/null
scripts.test: npm run test-node-all && npm run test-browser
